alert.note: Alert for Koochiching (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 22 at 3:20PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Koochiching County through 345 PM CDT... At 319 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Gemmell, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds gusts up to 30 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Margie around 335 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Big Falls. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.
